advanced_optics.system: Spend a turn focusing and gain a +3 equipment bonus on any rolls that would benefit from magnification (Eg, Investigation, Larceny or Science). Blind to anything not in field of view.

blade_hand.system: Reflexively summon or dismiss the blade hand. 4L rating weapon, initative penalty -3.

claws_and_fangs.appearance: Metal or bone claws, needles, etc.
claws_and_fangs.system: 2L rating weapon, no initiative penalty. Can be used to grapple.

component_indicators.appearance: Pale blue rubbery covered with pores and bumps.
component_indicators.system: Perform comprehensive chemical testing by touching a sample for a minute. Identify things like DNA, molecular components, etc etc. Can interpret the data if necessary with an Intelligence + Science roll.

detachable_limbs.appearance: Gaps between joints. Leaks oil when detached.
detachable_limbs.system: Detach any individual limb at each joint, including the torso. Each limb is under full control and can act independently. Can spend 1 Aether to instantly regrow a limb (torso counts as two) destroying the originally detached limb. Can reattach the detached limbs as an instant action, as well.

electrical_sight.system: See electrical signals and currents. Roll Intelligence + Composure to zero in on, interpret and eavesdrop on a given signal.

emp_field.appearance: Wires and circuits and a metallic sheen.
emp_field.system: Spend an instant action and one Aether to roll Intelligence + Primum. Short out and disable all electrical devices within 5 feet per success.

fast_attack.appearance: Red swirling tattoos over hands and arms.
fast_attack.system: +2 initiative. After successfully striking someone, as long as the demon continues to attack that person she may reset her initiative to act before her target. Initiative reverts when no longer fighting that specific person.

inhuman_intelligence.appearance: Visible alterations to head and cranium.

lighting.appearance: Torches, LEDs or other sources of light in the body.
lighting.system: Eliminates any penalties from darkness when active. Can blind a target (causing Blindness tilt) as an instant action unless resisted by Wits + Composure - Primum.

limb_retractor.appearance: Slight increase in size of withdrawn area. Missing limbs look kinda like lumps, like the navel.
limb_retractor.system: Reflexively draw Arms, Legs or the head into the Abdomen, protecting it from outside harm. Can pull objects of Size 2 or less into the body to be hidden as well.

low_density.appearance: Feet look spidery or like a bundle of roots.
low_density.system: Walk on sand, snow or liquids without difficulty. Ignore "Flooded" and "Ice" tilts. May still require Dexterity + Athletics checks in very extreme conditions.

mental_resistance.appearance: Faint blue and icy to the touch.

nauseating_musk.appearance: Blood-coloured sweat droplets all over skin. Odour of garbage within about 10 yards.
nauseating_musk.system: As an instant action, inflicts the "Sick" tilt on any creature within 10 yards which have a sense of smell.

night_vision.appearance: Pupils fill with green light or fluid.
night_vision.system: See in the dark as if broad daylight, and +2 to Perception rolls.

olfactory_enhancements.appearance: Instead of a nose, has a wire mesh with flashing olfactory detectors behind it.
olfactory_enhancements.system: +3 bonus to Wits checks that benefit from a sharp sense of smell. "Red herring" scents do not deceive or inconvenience. Can track a scent with a Wits + Survival roll.

radio_suite.appearance: A radio-type device is embedded into the skin, as well as aerials with the appearance of veins.
radio_suite.system: Mastery over radio signals. Tune in and listen to all broadcasts with perfect clarity, interrupt any radio frequency or broadcast either voice or anything the Demon can hear over the frequency.

resistors.appearance: Glass and ceramic resistors connected by copper wiring adorn the body.
resistors.system: Ignore the first source of damage suffered. The resistors shatter and are not restored until the Demon's health pool is completely refilled.

rivet_arm.appearance: An entire arm becomes a large projectile tool.
rivet_arm.system: Reflexively summon or dismiss the rivet arm. Gun rolls Wits + Firearms to attack, with a 3L damage rating, no initiative penalty, and infinite ammunition and clip size. +2 to relevant building projects.

sense_the_angelic.system: Roll Wits + Investigation to notice the influence of an angelic Numen within the past 24 hours. If the effect has been encountered before, identify it as such.

slippery_body.system: +3 to Defense against grapples. +3 to escape a grapple. Can squeeze through tight spaces as if -1 size.

sonic_acuity.system: Hear sounds of all frequencies and volumes without disorientation or pain. Can concentrate to hear sounds through solid walls. +3 to Perception via hearing. Cannot be surprised or Deafened.

spurs.system: Climb vertical surfaces. +3 to climbing. Climb 20 feet instead of 10. 1L rating weapon, no initiative penalty.

steel_frame.appearance: Steel rivets stick out of the skin, ringing vital areas and joints.
steel_frame.system: The Demon's bones cannot be broken unless the source can bend steel (Durability 3, Size 0-2, Structure 3-5). Ignore "Arm Wrack", "Leg Wrack" tilts and wound penalties. Always have access to brass knuckles due to rivets on the fist (0L, ±0 Initiative).

tough_as_stone.system: Spend one Aether to downgrade all damage from an attack by one (aggravated to lethal, lethal to bashing). Cannot stack on one attack, but can be used against multiple attacks in the same round.

unyielding_vice.appearance: Pneumatic pumps, hoses and pistons adorn the hand.
unyielding_vice.system: The demon's grip is near-unbreakable and can grasp onto anything that would not physically destroy the hand. Gain +5 in grapples as well.

casts_no_reflection.appearance: Body distorts light and is hard to process visually.
casts_no_reflection.system: Visage is not captured by reflective surfaces or recording media.

conjuration.appearance: Pseudo-magnetic mesh on palms of hands.
conjuration.system: Apply the benefits of the Quick Draw and Sleight of Hand Merits through teleporting objects short distances.

dead_reckoning.system: Apply the rote quality to Streetwise and Survival actions to self-orient.

ghost_sight.system: Perceive ghosts and spirits in Twilight.

multiple_eyes.system: Ignore the Blindness Tilt and Blind Condition except when they represent total lack of visibility in the demon's surroundings. +2 to Perception rolls using vision.

quills.system: Armor +1/0. Inflict 1L damage when struck by a Brawl or Melee attack that did not roll an exceptional success.

relentless.system: Ignore suffocation, hunger, thirst, tiring and fatigue.

weather_sense.system: Detect current or future weather within (10×Primum) miles.
